headline: Merck (MRK) as a Reliable Dividend Player in the Dogs of the Dow Lineup
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) is included among the 11 Dogs of the Dow Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) has faced stock pressure due to its reliance on Keytruda but is diversifying. On July 9, Merck announced it would acquire UK biotech Verona Pharma for $10 billion, adding Ohtuvayre, a […]

headline: Federal Reserve meeting, July jobs report, and Big Tech earnings: What to watch this week
summary: The stock market is at record highs as investors brace for what's expected to be the busiest week of the summer on Wall Street.
